title: 显示unknown host
author: xuemingyu333
txt_content:
服务器无法连接 Cant resolve hostname
Unknown host

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
xuemingyu333 发表于 2020-8-19 13:22
好多服务器都进不去
参照这个修改下 dns 呢？
https://jingyan.baidu.com/article/2fb0ba40833b0a00f2ec5f28.html

填 114.114.114.114

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
检查下是不是用了全角的冒号。

也就是关闭输入法去输入

replies.txt_content:
